snippet: One night in 1928, when he was topping the bill at the Earl Carroll Theater on Seventh Avenue, W.C. Fields was hauled before a judge after his show and charged with torturing a canary.
abstract: One night in 1928, when he was topping the bill at the Earl Carroll Theater on Seventh Avenue, W.C. Fields was hauled before a judge after his show and charged with torturing a canary.

headline.main: Before 'Chickadee' Fame, Fields Had Canary Trouble
headline.print_headline: Before ‘Chickadee’ Fame, Fields Got Into Canary Trouble
